thread.section_title: Hitchweb.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hitchweb.com | hitchweb.com
thread.title: Joe

author: Joe
title: Joe
text: They sent me a link to track my purchase. A link to a courier company that was not delivering my purchase. When I contacted Hitchweb. They told me that they did not know that the courier was not delivering my purchase. Then they give me a link to the courier that is supposed to be delivering my purchase. The link has a message saying that my address is a bad address. Cannot be located. After going back and forth with Hitchweb about the Bad address. they tell me that they gave my phone number to the courier company and I will have to deal with them direct, because it was time for them to leave the office. I will never deal with Hitchweb ever again
